name: otw
description: The IMDb of Sporting Events - discover, rate, and recommend unmissable sports moments
author: romdj

scripts.build:parallel: npm run build:server & npm run build:frontend & npm run build:app && wait
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:server && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:db
scripts.test:parallel: npm run test:server & npm run test:frontend & npm run test:app & npm run test:db && wait
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:server && npm run test:coverage:frontend && npm run test:coverage:db
scripts.lint:parallel: npm run lint:server & npm run lint:frontend & npm run lint:app && wait
scripts.check:parallel: npm run check:server & npm run check:frontend && wait
scripts.clean: npm run clean:server && npm run clean:frontend && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.complete-build: clear; npm run clean; npm run install:all; npm run build:parallel; npm run test:parallel; npm run lint:parallel; npm run check:parallel
scripts.validate:all: npm run test:parallel && npm run lint:parallel && npm run check:parallel && npm run build:parallel
scripts.docker:clean: docker-compose down --rmi all -v && docker system prune -f
scripts.fix: npm run lint:server -- --fix && npm run lint:frontend -- --fix
scripts.check:all: npm run lint && npm run check && npm audit --audit-level=high
scripts.health: curl -f http://localhost:4000/health && echo ' ✓ Server healthy' || echo ' ✗ Server unhealthy'
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all && npm run build
scripts.release:branch: npm run release:prepare && git checkout -b release/v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
scripts.release:tag: git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git push origin v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
